hero.title: About
hero.description: Sri Lanka's first AI Red Teaming and Vulnerability Research agency, dedicated to making artificial intelligence safer for everyone.

founder.name: Shehan Nilukshan
founder.title: Founder & Lead AI Security Researcher
founder.bio: Shehan Nilukshan founded AI RedCell to explore AI jailbreaking techniques ethically, discovering vulnerabilities before malicious actors can exploit them. His work focuses on prompt injection, AI safety, and responsible disclosure.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To advance AI security through ethical research, making AI systems safer for global deployment through responsible vulnerability disclosure and community education.

values.title: Ethical Research
values.description: All our work follows strict ethical guidelines and responsible disclosure practices.

values.title: Transparency
values.description: We believe in open sharing of knowledge to benefit the entire AI security community.

values.title: Innovation
values.description: Constantly developing new techniques to stay ahead of emerging AI threats.

values.title: Education
values.description: Committed to training the next generation of AI security professionals.
